name: RAGNARÖK (Josh Hardy)
description:
RAGNARÖK is a third-person action-adventure game drenched in Norse mythology. A close, intimate third-person camera, savage attacks, finishing moves and a small magic ability system. This is my Final Major Project at University and is currently around 8 weeks into production.

It is essentially a game prototype and my first attempt at making a substantial 3D game in my favourite genre. I recommend playing with a controller/gamepad and as I am only halfway through production there will be further balancing, voice recordings and an art pass later on with environmental storytelling and some extra visual language etc. but any feedback is appreciated!

I would appreciate feedback and bug reporting as I enter the testing phase of my project. Either way, I hope you enjoy playing it :)

LINK TO BUG REPORT: https://forms.gle/paFSro14bUA5rueB6

LINK TO FEEDBACK/RECOMMENDATION FORM: https://forms.gle/GVKfYp2C6tv5SsMU7

BACKSTORY:

You are Freya, the Vanir Goddess and Wife of the All-father Odin. Loki killed your son Baldr and has been in hiding. However, a recent Ice giant threat has cropped up in Midgard and Midgards protector - Thor-  is nowhere to be found. Leaving it up to Freya to dispel the giants and avenge her son.

P.S: There's no time for a tutorial so if the hints are not enough, a full list of controls can be seen in the paused menu.
